This sweater is a cozy and comfortable material. It is on the heavier side but warm and perfect for early winter/late fall weather when temperatures are starting to drop. I am 5’5” and 135. I bought the black and lake green in small size, fits well, Sleeves slightly too long. Medium weight sweater fits comfortably over a long-sleeved shirt. Good value for the price.

My husband really liked this sweater. It has really nice details of a lighter color at the wrists and waist, which makes it look more elevated.  It can be worn zipped up or with the zipper down and collar folded.  We got the brown color and it was a lovely rich brown.  I would consider this a thicker sweater, but works for our West Coast cooler weather.  My husband got his usual size of Large and it fit true to size. Not sure how it will wash and dry or pill yet.

Super soft and comfortable, this stylish sweater is perfect for fall or early spring.  The material seems to be a brushed polyester but feels like cotton... very soft and non-irritating to the skin.  I like the 1/4 zip for the neck... easy to put on and remove and zipper seems to be a decent quality.  It has survived 2 wash cycles without incident so seems to be fairly durable as well.  Overall, I'm quite pleased.

I've tried a number of Coofandy products in the last couple of years, and the one thing that stands out is quality.  This is no exception.  The weave of the sweater is consistent, the finishing is of high quality and the fit is size-appropriate.  The products launder well... we machine wash on cold and dry flat in a drying cabinet.  The sweater retains its shape and does not shrink.This is a comfortable, breathable sweater that both looks and feels good to wear.  I would order it again.
Sweater was a nice fit. Good quality for the price. Husband really liked it.

评论概述: Room enough for wearing something underneath, Slim Fit
评论详情: This is a lightweight casual shirt.  Bottom band has no elastic, or anything so just lays flat...you could tuck it in.  The blue is medium blue, not too light but not a deep navy either, has the white contrasting details.  Partial zip @ neckline adds noticeable detail and works as easy access to put shirt on.
This jacket is made well. I’d consider it mid weight. It’s extremely comfortable and the zipper is made well too. It’s a regular fit, and an excellent find.

I can't say too much more about this Pullover than I did in the title.  The material is very nice and soft. It's light enough to comfortablely wear a shirt under and not feel overheated or uncomfortable.  The fit is excellent. I bought this for my son who looks very stylish in it! It washed up well and kept color and softness. Super happy with this pullover and good price for something this nice!

It's a shame I got this wonderful sweater in the month of August on the hottest day of the year, because it was so comfortable! Being indoors in the air conditioning was just fine wearing this, it says "Slim Fit," but I am far from slim and it fits great. It's stretchy in all the places that matter, the XL size fit like a loose glove. Very comfortable! I could zip it all the way up, but I have a thick neck, so even though it's possible, I decided not to. Can't wait for cooler weather when I'll be sporting this through the holidays!

I ordered this gray quarter zip pullover for my husband, who is 6'5" with an athletic build, and he’s very pleased with it! The slim fit is flattering, and the lightweight fabric is perfect for layering. The mock neck and quarter zip design offer both style and comfort. The fit complements his tall frame well, making it a versatile addition to his wardrobe. Highly recommended!

This is a nice sweater that I would wear to work, dinner, or even church. Very versatile and I love the way this brand weaves its sweaters and mock turtlenecks. I would recommend it to anyone looking for this style of sweater. Fits true to size.

评论概述: This brand does not take shortcuts.
评论详情: Heavy weave and weight - leaves this item for the colder days for comfort. very stretchy and comfortable. Great weave and style. No resentment here.

Super soft and comfortable. I would get one in every color. Light weight and easy to wear in any weather condition. The style of this fits so loose and comfortable for active wear. Looks causal but nice too.

评论概述: Fits well, will keep you warm
评论详情: This sweater fits well and sort of forms to your body due to the stretchiness. The color is vibrant, maybe a bit dark. I hadn't noticed the white piping on it which didn't really help the style in my opinion. That, and the high collar made it look a bit dated to me. Otherwise a great find!

评论概述: A really really nicely made sweater/shirt that looks and feels beautiful!
评论详情: I have ordered perhaps a dozen different garments from this company, and they are almost uniformly great. This sweater / shirt is among my favorites! It is nice thick fabric, and would be great for late fall or winter days. It is generously sized, and the fabric feels soft and durable. After washing and hanging it dry, it looks beautiful. I particularly like the little striping at the sleeves and at the bottom of the waist. This shirt / sweater already feels like home! I would highly recommend it.
looks so nice on my husband and fits terrific as a medium.  his only complaint is that it's synthetic material and he prefers cotton blend.

Let me start by saying my hubs has a long torso. This sweater fit perfectly without having to go to a "tall" size.  The color purchased was light brown. It's a beautiful camel color, with a white band along the bottom of the sleeves and the body of the sweater.  It's gorgeous! It's soft, warm, and looks like luxury. I can't wait to go out with him this fall, looking all sorts of awesome in this sweater!
Got this sweater for my husband. He absolutely loves it. It is light weight and super comfortable. It runs true to size
Not too thick or thin. Just right and fits great. Not loose and big looking. Regular slim like. I like.

评论概述: Great size and feels great quality.
评论详情: I ordered this for my husband, and it looks amazing. It looks like it's a very nice quality sweater. The contrast on it I thought I would dislike but it's actually nice to have that bit of contrast color. The material feels really nice and like it will hold up really well. The zipper seems to work well. It fits true to size.

I'm about 5' 8" and 220lb. I got the XL size and it fits me well. Loose enough to be comfortable but not too snug to make my belly stand out. The sweather is heavier than I thought it would be, so good thickness and durability, but it's also soft and comfortable to wear. Good cut and design accents make this an easy choice and I would recommend it.
I like the style of this sweater very much. The material is of good quality, very good for chilly weather in the fall. Well made and stylish. I like most of the clothes from Coofandy.

I was pleasantly surprised with the weight and feel of this sweater. It is on the heavy side of cotton sweaters. Definitely a fall or winter piece. The stitching is all well done and the zipper moves well without catching. The weave is nice and tight and resistant to pulls. Color and size are both as expected from the product pages.

评论概述: Great fit and super comfortable, too!
评论详情: Love everything about this pullover! It's VERY comfortable...it's surprisingly light, it fits true to size, and the color is a nice, rich blue that looks great with anything! It washes and dries nicely, too, which is a plus. Goes great with shorts as a pullover for cooler evenings etc and for jeans/dress pants too. It's made very well too and you can feel the quality of the thread, so I have no doubt this will last for a long time.  Overall, I can't think of anything but good things to say about this pullover. Highly recommend!

I really like this. It feels like it should be double the cost. I also like it because it can be worn with jeans or be dressed up for business attire with dress pants. I wear this style of clothing a lot in the winter here in the deep south as you need layers to make it through the day. I am looking forward to cooler weather so I can wear this. I usually wear an XL and bought an XL. It fits but is slightly smaller than most XLs.

评论概述: Ok, nice navy blue color, thick, comfortable, but not great.
评论详情: Review for "COOFANDY Men's Quarter Zip Up Pullover Slim Fit Lightweight Mock Neck Long Sleeve Sweater"  This sweater is heavy and seems to be well made. I like the navy blue color and the zipper at the neck. When I ordered it I did not realize that it had white striping on the hem and on the end of the sleeves, which I don't like. Not sure how I missed that when I looked at the amazon page.  My main concern is the bottom hem. I like to wear sweaters that stop at the waist and not just straight down. The hem for this has a little elastic in it but its not going to stay up at my waist but will drop down until its just straight down. Since I had to get a little bigger size do to some extra belly weight, the sweater is long and will drop down pretty far.  Pros: Nicely made, nice color, like the zipper and the way that looks. Cons: The white striping doesn't look good to me and the elastic hem at the waist will not hold it up.
This men’s lightweight sweater is nicely made. Half zip collar. Sized nicely. Roomy and comfortable. Non constrictive.
